attributes.action: Cancel all BTEC and Vocational exams that are due to take place in January 2021
attributes.additional_details: Lost learning due to learning Covid 19 and remote learning has now put BTEC and Vocational students in an impossible position to take these exams in January 2021, also the announcement from the education secretary must see them postponed or cancelled.
attributes.background: Following the announcement from the education secretary regarding school and college delays and lost learning for BTEC students all BTEC and Vocational exams need to be postponed or cancelled in January 2021 as soon as possible.
